string.name: parent
string.value: Information about the Slumbering Dragon Island
#p1002001# says that it won't be easy getting to the island marked on the map. There must be some other way. Ask #b#p1002001##k again.

#p1002001# says that the only sailor in #m104000000# who has the ability to sail to the island marked on the map is #b#p1002101##k. But #p1002101# stopped sailing a long time ago... If you bring him some #t4032470#, maybe #p1002101# will change his mind. Go to #b#m110000000##k and bring back a #b#t4032470##k.

#i4032526# #t4032526# #b#c4032526# / 1#k
#i4032470# #t4032470# #b#c4032470# / 1#k
#p1002101# gladly agreed to sail after receiving the #t4032470#.
Must you go to the island on this map? If so, I can't help you. But I know someone who might be able to... #b#p1002101##k. He's retired now, but #p1002101# is the best crew member I know.
Like I said, #p1002101# retired a long time ago. He doesn't miss it much, either... He may not want to help you, but I know something that might change #p1002101#'s mind.
If you bring #p1002101# some #t4032470#, he might change his mind. Go to #b#m110000000##k and see if you can find some #b#t4032470##k. They don't make it often, so it might be hard to get...
Hm, I guess you're not THAT interested.

Ah, I don't think we've met. But you seem quite competent. It's rare to find someone so strong that I haven't trained myself. But what brings you here? Eh? You want me to take you to the island on this map?
Hahaha, someone must have told you that I was the best crew member in town! But I'm retired. I don't have any desire to get back on a ship. I'm just here to guide adventurers and offer advice.
Oh, isn't this...#t4032470#? Oh, boy! There's always a shortage of this in Florina Beach. It smells delicious... Are you giving it to me?
Haha, what a generous person you are! Alright, why not? I'll take you to the island on the map. It'll be a nice change of pace.
Wait, where is this island? Let me look at the map again.
Haven't you gone to see Olaf? Don't go empty-handed. Take him some Tropical Fruit Punch or something. You'll be able to get some in Florina Beach.
Hm, what is it? I don't mind guiding a beginner adventurer, but you are much too strong to be a beginner...
You're clumsy. Look, you dropped the map. Here, don't lose it again.
